website_summaries.verdict: A French-style bedroom set that provides a lot of furniture for the price. It manages to have both simplicity and style for a reasonable price.
pros: Includes 4 pieces for a reasonable price
Lighter weight than some sets, which makes it easier to move
cons: Doesn't come with enough boards to fully support a mattress

customer_reviews.title: overall good set very clean look
customer_reviews.text: overall good set very clean look. HOWEVER THE BED IS SUPER FLIMSY!!!!! I had to buy more slats and im really scared to move too much on it - it fell in when two of the slats broke in half. the metal inserts break off the side rails very easily and the original slats are very thin - will not hold heavy heavy weight unless reinforced. Another draw back for me the drawers do not extend out very far and they arent deep at all so when things fall behind the draws (no individual inside drawer levels) its hard to get back there. Plus though, all the drawers come assembled
customer_reviews.author: misst

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture! Be prepared to add slats to the bed frame. Must be 60 5/8 " wide.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what everyone is complaining about! Theis set is awesome! Do beware that when you unbox the bed and dresser that the hardware can be easily mossed in the packaging. This furniture is solid. My only complaint is that the bed frame is 60 5/8ths inches wide so my old slats didnt fit. We did have to add some, but honestly still worth it. Luck of the draw if you receive damages goods. Our furniture was well protected and nicely packed. The company may have made improvements in this area.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice Furniture
customer_reviews.text: A five piece furniture at this price is a good deal It's super easy to put the bed together in fact I put mine together by myself. The dresser, chest and side table are very light. The only complaint I have is the I with the drawers opened more or can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kegler

customer_reviews.title: Love it mostly
customer_reviews.text: The wood plugs to cover the screws at the edges of the bed dont fit correctly, some of them are too small, they keep falling out, and some are too big we have to cut it smaller to fit them in the holes. The chest has a scratch that's not caused by shipping. and the bed doesnt work well with our 8 inches memory foam mattress. I guess the "no box spring needed" are for regular mattress, just FYI. besides that, everything else are good, we love them even tho it they have the cons. All in all, money well spent, its very reasonable price for a whole set of bedroom furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian💕Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: Love the set, my only complaint is the nightstand is a little short, looks taller in the picture. I wish the drawers would come out of the chest and dresser, it would have made it easier to move!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build. Great seller. Good price. Chest and Night stand comes already built. Dresser, you just have to put the mirror. Looks exactly the picture describes. Will buy another one. Great communication by seller. all screws and everything attached. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The color is great and matches the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The interior of the drawers needed to be sanded. There were minor scratches and dents and some of the furniture was not level. The instructions to build the bed were a little confusing at first, especially for the support for the mattress. The color is great and matches the pictures. The pieces are lightweight and easy to move for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Justina L.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is not what I was expecting, I don't like it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Grant

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is EXTREMELY rude. Bed makes a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is EXTREMELY rude. Bed makes a lot of noise and my dresser cane cracked. I will never order from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtny Hasson

customer_reviews.title: Good decision !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful !! Easy to read instructions. Very nice set. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a Bedroom Suite
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for bedroom. Furniture is perfect for smaller bedrooms. Holding up well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Irapcola

customer_reviews.title: Pretty But Not Solid
customer_reviews.text: Looks is a 5 stars but Not solid at all, and the bed makes noises. The chest arrived damaged, I asked for a replacement and I still don't know if I'll get it, and it's been almost a month. Communication was not good. And again The LOOKS of the set is Fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeordan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. The packages are very Excellent protection
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Ng Cortinas

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: For the price we paid it was a good buy I guess. Bed was easy to assemble in an hour. Ofcourse you need some one else to hold. Side table and Chest come do not need any assembling. The dressing table needs mirror to be fixed at your desirable height. Bed feels light and easily moveable. If you want a heavy sturdy bed don't go for this. I have used it only for 2-3 weeks and can't say about his durability. overall it gives a good look to the bed room for the money we paid. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RNS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth cost
customer_reviews.text: Though I did not purchase my set via Amazon I own the very same set. The bed rails brook within the first month of owning it and now two three years later I am replacing all the flimsy handles on the dresser that started to come off within the first few months of ownership. Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Rose DesRochers

product_meta.title: Poundex Louis Phillipe Cherry Queen Size Bedroom Set Featuring French Style Sleigh Platform Bed and Matching Nightstand, Dresser, Mirror, Chest
product_meta.description: The Louis Phillipe cherry wood bedroom set is the perfect option for those wanting more bang for their buck. Ideal for those wanting to upgrade their kids from bunk beds to a full bedroom set alternative. If you are looking to have a furniture set that is durable, stylish and very cost effective then the Louis Phillipe package is just what you are looking for. The Louis Phillipe features smooth surfaces, curved panels and detailed lines drape. The bedroom set features matching curved casegoods with silver hardware. The sleigh platform bed brings the perfect finishing touches for your bedroom. Furniture Included: 1 Headboard 48" H 1 Footboard 30" H 1 Set of Rails 1 Dresser: 56" L x 15" D x 35" H 1 Mirror: 34 L x 37H 1 Night Stands: 22" L x 15" D x 24" H 1 Chest: 32" L x 15" D x 47" H
feature_bullets: Cherry Wood French Style Bedroom Set
Furniture Included 1 Queen Bed, 1 NS, 1 Dresser, 1 Mirror, 1 Chest
Smooth Surfaces and Detailed Line Drapes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars18 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
